title: Rambley the Racoon

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of a game, choose a player. They will become your guest.
- Assist your guest. This will prevent them from being redirected, witched, and/or roleblocked. You will also grant them Invincible defense for the night. 2 Charges.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have a chat with your target.
- If your target is a part of an REF, you will join their chat if they have one.
- **Digitial Being:**Your identity is public, and you cannot die unless the proper killswitch condition is met.
- **Killswitch condition:** Have your guest die.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure your target has a great time in Indigo Park.

desc:
Post 5182
*"And it's my job to make sure your experience here at Indigo Park is the most fun it can be!"*
